items.sentence: Tom was unable to talk Mary out of marrying John.
She stared at him and that made him very nervous.
She used to wash her hair before going to school.
Some people like volleyball, others enjoy tennis.
Some wild animals are on the verge of extinction.
The police are searching for an escaped prisoner.
Tom shot himself with his father\'s gun and died.
Tom told Mary that he couldn\'t live without her.
Tom told Mary something she didn\'t want to hear.
I don\'t feel like going shopping with you today.
